title: Greece
summary: With the longest presence of any foreign bank in Greece since 1964 and being a product pioneer in the domestic financial market, Citi plays a critical role in the country’s growth and development by providing awarded services to national and international industry leaders as well as the Greek sovereign.
tag-2: Citi paves the way of international investors to Greece and ushers Greek state & corporates into the international markets.
